definitions: in a way that does not stay the same throughout
shortDefinitions: in way that does not stay same throughout

definitions: in a way that is at variance with ones principles or former behavior

examples.text: in the real world, people behave inconsistently and contradict themselves

shortDefinitions: in a way at variance with ones principles or former behaviour

definitions: in a way that is not compatible or in keeping with something

examples.text: they acted inconsistently with their professional obligations

shortDefinitions: in way not compatible with something
